trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 提供访问和管理进程内语音识别引擎的方式。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 可以为任何已安装的语音识别器来创建此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关哪些安装识别器的信息，请使用静态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 此类是运行语音识别引擎中的进程，并提供控制语音识别的各个方面，如下所示:-若要创建进程内语音识别器，使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -若要管理语音识别语法，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要配置识别器的输入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要执行语音识别，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -若要修改静默或意外的输入识别的处理方式，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -若要更改在识别器返回的替代项的数目，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: 识别器返回识别导致<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要将更改同步到识别器，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: 识别器使用多个线程来执行任务。

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -若要模拟识别器的输入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionEngine 对象是唯一使用的进程的实例化对象。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: 与之相反，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>共享单个识别器与任何应用程序想要使用它。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>在发布到语音识别器最后一个引用之前。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源不会被释放之前垃圾回收器调用识别器对象的`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>类使用系统的默认语音识别器。

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器可以开始语音识别之前，必须加载至少一个识别语法，并配置在识别器的输入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的语法，调用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要配置的音频的输入，使用以下方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>类默认语音识别器用于指定区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行使用中指定的语言的语音识别`CultureInfo`参数时，语音识别引擎支持，必须安装语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: 随 Microsoft Windows 7 的语音识别引擎使用以下语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -EN-GB。

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: 英语 （英国）-EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: 英语 （美国）-DE-DE。

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: 德语 （德国）-ES-ES。

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: 西班牙语 （西班牙）-fr 法属

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: 法语 （法国）-JA-JP。

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: 日语 （日本）-ZH-CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中国）-ZH-TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 此外允许"en"、"fr"或"es"等的中文 （台湾） 两个字母的语言代码。

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器可以开始识别之前，必须加载至少一个语音识别语法，并配置在识别器的输入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的语法，调用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要配置的音频的输入，使用以下方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器必须支持的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 任何已安装的语音识别器都不支持指定的区域设置，或 culture 是固定的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>使用中的信息<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref>对象来指定识别器使用。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 可以为任何已安装的语音识别器来创建此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关哪些安装识别器的信息，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器可以开始识别之前，必须加载至少一个语音识别语法，并配置在识别器的输入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的语法，调用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要配置的音频的输入，使用以下方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 有关特定语音识别器信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>类指定识别器使用的名称的字符串参数。

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 识别的标记名称是值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>识别器的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get a collection of all the installed recognizers, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取所有已安装的识别器的集合，请使用静态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器可以开始识别之前，必须加载至少一个语音识别语法，并配置在识别器的输入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的语法，调用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要配置的音频的输入，使用以下方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器用于标记名称。

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 安装没有语音识别器具有该令牌的名称，或 recognizerId 为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在接收的音频格式<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要配置的音频的输入，使用以下方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: 音频的输入的格式<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>实例，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果输入未配置或设置为 null 的输入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在接收的音频的级别<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: 值 0 表示静默，，100 表示最大输入的卷。

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器，从 0 到 100 的输入音频级别。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 时引发<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>报告其音频的输入的级别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引发此事件每秒多次。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 与引发事件的频率取决于在其运行应用程序的计算机。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在事件的时间获取音频级别，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>的关联<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取识别器的输入的当前音频级别，使用识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 AudioLevelUpdated 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前正在生成的设备提供的输入音频流中的位置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: AudioPosition 属性引用在其生成的音频流中的输入的设备的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性引用其音频的输入内识别器的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 这些位置可以是不同的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果收到识别器输入其具有不但生成识别结果则的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性小于 AudioPosition 属性的值。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在生成的输入设备的音频流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: 时引发<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>音频信号中检测到的问题。

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取出现的问题，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>关联<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 AudioSignalProblemOccurred 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在接收的音频的状态<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: AudioState 属性表示的成员的音频状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>枚举。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器的音频输入状态。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当接收音频中的状态更改时，引发<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在事件的时间获取音频的状态，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>的关联<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取识别器的输入音频的当前状态，请使用识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关 audio 状态的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>枚举。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 AudioStateChanged 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在此期间的时间间隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>之前正在最后完成识别接受输入包含唯一背景噪音。

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: 每个语音识别器具有一种算法来区分静默和语音。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 识别器将分类为任何非静默输入与任何识别器的初始规则不匹配的背景噪音加载并启用语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器干扰的超时时间间隔内收到仅背景噪音，静默，识别器完成该识别操作。

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -对于异步识别操作识别器引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>事件，其中<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`true`，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -对于同步识别操作和仿真，请识别器返回`null`，而不是有效的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: 干扰超时期限设置为 0，识别器不会执行干扰超时检查。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔可以是任何非负值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 时间间隔持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为小于 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 释放<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 释放<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>在会话期间使用的对象并释放资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 模拟的短语语音识别器，用于同步语音识别的文本来代替音频的输入。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件就像非仿真识别操作。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 附带 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写和字符宽度时将语法规则应用于输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 有关这种比较类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>枚举值<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点作为文本输入。

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作输入。

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作的结果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果该操作不成功或未启用识别器。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: 识别器具有加载任何语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputText为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 模拟的特定单词语音识别器，用于同步语音识别，使用文本来代替音频的输入，并指定如何识别器处理 Unicode 单词和加载的语音识别语法之间的比较。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件就像非仿真识别操作。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 识别器使用`compareOptions`当它将语法规则应用于输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: 附带 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写，如果<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>值是否存在。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: 识别器总是忽略字符宽度，永远不会忽略假名类型。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点作为文本输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>枚举。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关识别操作的输入 word 单位的数组。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述要用于模拟的识别操作的比较类型的枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作的结果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果该操作不成功或未启用识别器。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: 识别器具有加载任何语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: wordUnits is .
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsis .

trans-unit.source: wordUnits contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: wordUnits包含一个或多个元素。

trans-unit.source: compareOptions contains the , , or flag.
trans-unit.target: compareOptions包含， ，或标志。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 模拟的短语语音识别器，用于同步语音识别，使用文本来代替音频的输入，并指定如何识别器处理 Unicode 短语和加载的语音识别语法之间的比较。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件就像非仿真识别操作。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 识别器使用`compareOptions`当它将语法规则应用于输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: 附带 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写，如果<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>值是否存在。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: 识别器总是忽略字符宽度，永远不会忽略假名类型。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点作为文本输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>枚举。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The input phrase for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述要用于模拟的识别操作的比较类型的枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作的结果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果该操作不成功或未启用识别器。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: 识别器具有加载任何语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputText为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: compareOptions包含， ，或标志。

trans-unit.target: 模拟的短语语音识别器，用于异步语音识别的文本来代替音频的输入。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.

trans-unit.target: 当识别器完成的异步识别操作时，将引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 附带 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写和字符宽度时将语法规则应用于输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 有关这种比较类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>枚举值<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点作为文本输入。

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作输入。

trans-unit.target: 识别器已加载，没有语音识别语法或识别器有一个尚未完成的异步识别操作。

trans-unit.target: 模拟语音识别器，使用一组特定的词的输入<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"></xref>对象代替异步语音识别，适用于的音频，并指定在识别器处理 Unicode 比较单词和加载的语音识别语法的方式。

trans-unit.target: 包含有关识别操作的输入 word 单位的数组。

trans-unit.target: 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>枚举。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The input phrase for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作输入的短语。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述要用于模拟的识别操作的比较类型的枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputText为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: compareOptions contains the , , or flag.
trans-unit.target: compareOptions包含， ，或标志。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation of emulated input.
trans-unit.target: 时引发<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>完成异步识别模拟输入运算。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法开始一个异步识别操作。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引发 EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件它完成异步操作。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>操作可引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件是最后一个这种情况下识别器引发指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was successful, you can access the recognition result using the either of the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object in the handler for the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: 如果模拟的识别成功，则可以访问使用以下任一识别结果:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件的处理程序中的对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>的处理程序中的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event is not raised and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果模拟的识别未成功完成，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>不会引发事件和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>将为 null。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>派生自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you create an EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 EmulateRecognizeCompleted 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of unambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的静默间隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>最终确定识别操作之前将接受明确输入的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is unambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 明确识别输入时，语音识别器将使用此超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于支持识别的语音识别语法"新游戏请"或"新游戏"，"新游戏请"是明确的输入，和"新游戏"是不明确的输入。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定多长时间的语音识别引擎将等待附加输入在最终确定识别操作之前。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔为 10 秒，包括从 0 秒是。

trans-unit.source: The default is 150 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 150 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for ambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置二义性输入的超时间隔，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 静默间隔持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为 0 秒小于或大于 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of ambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的静默间隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>最终确定识别操作之前将接受二义性输入的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 不明确识别输入时，语音识别器将使用此超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于支持识别的语音识别语法"新游戏请"或"新游戏"，"新游戏请"是明确的输入，和"新游戏"是不明确的输入。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定多长时间的语音识别引擎将等待附加输入在最终确定识别操作之前。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔为 10 秒，包括从 0 秒是。

trans-unit.source: The default is 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 500 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for unambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置明确输入的超时间隔，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 静默间隔持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为 0 秒小于或大于 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>中加载的对象<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在此期间的时间间隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>最终确定识别之前接受输入包含唯一静默。

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: 每个语音识别器具有一种算法来区分静默和语音。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer input is silence during the initial silence timeout period, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器输入初始静默在超时期限内，则静默，识别器完成该识别操作。

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -对于异步识别操作和仿真，请识别器引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>事件，其中<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`true`，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -对于同步识别操作和仿真，请识别器返回`null`，而不是有效的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the initial silence timeout interval is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform an initial silence timeout check.
trans-unit.target: 初始静默超时间隔设置为 0，识别器不会执行初始静默超时检查。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔可以是任何非负值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 静默间隔持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为小于 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: Returns information for all of the installed speech recognizers on the current system.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前系统上所有已安装的语音识别器的信息。

trans-unit.source: To get information about the current recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关当前识别器的信息，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> objects that describe the installed recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref>这些对象描述的已安装的识别。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously loads a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式加载<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 识别器引发异常，如果<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象已加载、 正在以异步方式加载，或无法加载到任何识别器。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 无法加载相同<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>的对象置于<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>的多个实例</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用语法的语音识别引擎。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 当加载语法时，它会启用默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: When you create a LoadGrammarCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 LoadGrammarCompleted 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent possible interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>类包含的集合<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>表示的输入的可能解释的对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: MaxAlternates is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates 设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of settings for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 返回在识别器设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data.
trans-unit.target: 识别器设置可以包含字符串、 64 位整数或内存地址数据。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍有关 Microsoft 语音 API (SAPI) 定义的设置的符合识别器。

trans-unit.source: The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置必须具有相同的范围，用于支持设置每个识别器。

trans-unit.source: A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings.
trans-unit.target: SAPI 符合识别器不需要支持这些设置，并且可支持其他设置。

trans-unit.source: |Name|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption.
trans-unit.target: |名称 |说明 | |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|指定在识别器的 CPU 消耗。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 范围是从 0 到 100。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 50。 | |`ResponseSpeed`|语音识别器完成识别操作之前，请指示静默明确输入末尾的长度。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms).
trans-unit.target: 范围是从 0 到 10000 毫秒 (ms)。

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此设置对应于识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值 = 150ms年。 | |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|语音识别器完成识别操作之前，请指示静默二义性输入末尾的长度。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000ms.
trans-unit.target: 范围是从 0 到 10，000ms。

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此设置对应于识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`).
trans-unit.target: 默认为 500年。 | |`AdaptationOn`|指示适应声音模型是否为 ON (值 = `1`) 或关闭 (值 = `0`)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`1`(ON)。 | |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|指示背景适应是否为 ON (值 = `1`) 或关闭 (值 = `0`)，并保存在注册表中的设置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| To update a setting for the recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`1`(ON)。 | 若要更新的识别器设置，请使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的设置的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the setting.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值。

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingName为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: 识别器不具有该名称的设置。

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行同步语音识别操作。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行单个识别操作。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs this operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 识别器执行此操作对其加载并已启用语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
